title: BBC Local Live: Essex on Tuesday, 3 May 2016 - BBC News
summary: ukip mep and thurrock councillor tim aker voluntarily speaks to police over allegations of sexual assault .
one of the pilots killed in a plane crash in north yorkshire at the weekend was from essex .
hapless thief is taunted by police on social media for leaving items behind at the scene of a crime .
braintree town secure a national league play-off place by beating altrincham at the weekend .
more news , sport , travel and weather updates from 08:00 on wednesday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's all from us at essex live today - thanks for joining us .
we 'll be back from 08:00 tomorrow with the latest news for essex and live coverage of colchester united 's manager announcement .
have a great evening .

documents.title: will colchester united appoint internally ?
text: more now on the news that colchester united are expected to name their new manager tomorrow .
the fact the club has moved to make this announcement barely a week after kevin keen departed points to an internal promotion .
the previous appointments of joe dunne and tony humes were also made quickly .
author: Glenn Speller
BBC Essex Sport

documents.title: astronaut tim peake calls basildon cancer patient from space
text: astronaut major tim peake has made a special video call from space to a five-year-old cancer patient from basildon who is being kept in isolation during her treatment .
the briton spoke to patients at great ormond street hospital , including maddison webb - who is recovering after a bone marrow transplant to treat acute lymphocyte leukaemia .
major peake and maddison discussed being separated from their families and restricted diets during the exchange which happened last week .

documents.title: cctv released after mcdonalds assault
text: police would like to trace this man caught on cctv following an assault at a mcdonalds restaurant in chelmsford .
the fight , which left a 19-year-old man with a dislocated jaw , happened in the high street in the early hours on 9 april .

documents.title: weather : clear spells overnight allowing a frost to form in places
text: cloud will clear through this evening to leave a dry and clear night across the area with light winds .
this will allow temperatures to fall low enough for a touch of frost to form in places as well as the odd isolated mist patch .
minimum temperature : 4c ( 39f ) .
you can stay up-to-date with the latest forecast where you live with bbc weather .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: ukip mep tim aker voluntarily speaks to police over allegations of sexual assault
text: ukip mep and thurrock councillor tim aker has voluntarily spoken to police over allegations of sexual assault .
essex police say they have `` spoken to the person '' reporting `` an allegation and inquiries are continuing '' .
last week anonymous letters were sent round to thurrock councillors and members of the public making claims against tim aker .
sources close to mr aker described these letters as making `` outrageous claims '' .
essex police have confirmed that they are also investigating `` an allegation of malicious communications relating to letters being sent to a number ofindividuals '' .

steve crowther , ukip chairman , said in a statement : `` i can confirm that the party looked into allegations that were put to us ; but it would be inappropriate for us to comment further on something which is subject to a police investigation , until that investigation is complete . ''

documents.title: unexploded ammunition found underneath colchester garage
text: unexploded mortars and a round of bullets were found just a foot below the ground when a builder was doing construction work at the back of his house .
author: Daily Gazette

documents.title: in the news : murder accused brett rogers found 'covered in blood ' colchester to name new manager tomorrow
text: here are the top stories for essex :
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex

documents.title: colchester united will announce keen 's replacement tomorrow
text: colchester united will name their new manager at a news conference tomorrow afternoon .
it 's after kevin keen left his position as u 's manager last tuesday following their relegation from league one .
the announcement is expected at about 14:00 .
you 'll be able to follow live updates here or through the bbc essex sport twitter feed .
author: Glenn Speller
BBC Essex Sport

documents.title: breakingcolchester to announce new manager at 14:00 tomorrow
text: football news just in .
colchester united will hold a news conference at 14:00 tomorrow to announce their new manager .
more details to follow .

documents.title: peter shilton : leicester city 's premier league win was not a fluke
text: leicester city 's premier league win was `` not a fluke '' , according to former foxes and england goalkeeper peter shilton .
the 5,000-1 outsiders beat bigger rivals tottenham , arsenal , manchester city , manchester united and chelsea to land their first top-flight title .
shilton , who now lives in essex , told the bbc : `` a lot of people doubted they could do it - but they 've done it , and they 've done it in style '' .

documents.title: teenager injured in clacton crash
text: a teenager has been taken to hospital following a crash in clacton this morning .
the east of england ambulance service says it was called to reports of a collision between a motorcyclist and car in jameson road at about 08:30 .
the man , who had neck and shoulder pain , was taken to colchester hospital for further treatment .
his injuries are not thought to be life-threatening .

documents.title: bernard jenkin : if uk remains in eu a lot of conservatives will leave party
text: the conservative mp for harwich and north essex bernard jenkin says `` a lot of supporters '' will leave the party if the remain camp wins the eu referendum .
he was talking to carolyn quinn on radio 4 's westminster hour .

as britain goes to the polls on 23 june to decide whether the uk should stay a member of the european union - use this guide to find out the arguments from the leave and remain sides on a range of key to

documents.title: your leigh bluebells in full bloom
text: thanks to bbc weather watcher `` labrador lady '' who has sent us this great shot from leigh-on-sea today .
the area had sunshine with temperatures at about 16c ( 60f ) .
we love seeing your photos from across the county .
you can send them to us via email , twitter , or visit our facebook page .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: man accused of mother 's murder found laughing and covered in blood , court told
text: a man accused of murdering his mother and her friend at a house in stansted mountfitchet was found at the scene laughing and covered in blood , a court has been told .
brett rogers , 23 , of bentfield gardens in the village , allegedly knifed gillian phillips , 54 , and david oakes , 60 , dozens of times in the fatal attack in june last year .
chelmsford crown court heard mr rogers called 999 about 23:00 and told police : `` there 's been a murder . ''
he denies two counts of murder .
the trial continues .

documents.title: canvey island mother takes children out of school in sats tests protest
text: a mother from canvey island says she has taken her two children out of school today in protests at new sats tests .
sonia mutch is one of thousands of parents unhappy at the new exams - but education secretary nicky morgan says taking pupils out of school `` even for a day is harmful to their education '' .

ms mutch , who has a five-year-old and a seven-year-old , told bbc essex : `` there does have to be an element of testing but they 've piled on too much pressure and it 's taken away the enjoyment in the classroom '' .

documents.title: weather : fine afternoon with plenty of sunshine
text: it will be a fine afternoon with plenty of sunshine and a scattering of light cloud .
maximum temperature : 15c ( 59f ) .
you can stay up-to-date with the latest forecast where you live with bbc weather .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: in the news : protesting mother says sats put 'too much pressure ' on children police taunt car thief over crisp clue
text: here are the top stories for essex this lunchtime :
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex

documents.title: essex look to bat worcestershire out of their county championship match
text: essex are looking to bat worcestershire out of their county championship match at new road .
alastair cook and tom westley both hit centuries on a rain interrupted second day .
with two days to go , essex are 335 for two .
author: Ben Fryer
BBC Essex sport

documents.title: essex 's mysterious 'van ' gogh shows how he turns dirty vehicles into art
text: last month we told you about an essex man who was turning dirty vans into works of art by drawing amazing in their muck .
well we recently invited the man , known only as mr konjusha , to our studios in chelmsford and this is what happened

documents.title: loughton car thief taunted by police over crisp clue
text: a hapless thief has been taunted by police for leaving crisps , a soft drink , tools and a balaclava at the scene of a crime .
the man was disturbed by the owner of the car he was trying to break into in loughton and dropped his bag .
essex police senior crime scene investigator ryan howell later tweeted a photo of the abandoned snacks and a message directed at the suspect .
`` they 're in my office at harlow , call 101 to get back , '' he joked .
breaking into cars last night ?
left your bag behind and crisps ?
they 're in my office at harlow , call 101 to get back
@ twitterid @ twitterid gone stale by know !
@ twitterid @ twitterid hmmmmm
@ twitterid i bet they perpatrader feels a bit of a quaver lol # wotabitofaplonker
@ twitterid both cheese flavoured sure it were n't a mouse ?
@ twitterid if no one claims them i 'll have them .
@ twitterid you ate his crisps ?
if i was him id be the ultimate tool and press charges of theft .
england where coppers are exempt from law
author: Jodie Smith
BBC News

documents.title: fact file : braintree town football club
text: as braintree town reach the national league play-offs , here 's three things you might want to know about the club .

documents.title: fossetts farm development would kill southend high street , retail group warns
text: a shopping centre at fossetts farm would be `` fatal '' to southend high street , according to the town 's leading retail association .
author: Southend Echo

documents.title: national union of teachers : sats tests 'damaging ' educational opportunities
text: essex parents are among thousands across the country taking their children out of school today as part of a protest against new sats tests .
campaigners say the exams put too much stress on youngsters aged six and seven .

jerry glazier , from the essex national union of teachers , who are also against the tests , told bbc essex an `` enormous '' amount of time was spent teaching the test `` damaging '' educational opportunities .

documents.title: can part-time braintree go all the way ?
text: ok - so it 's not quite the leicester city 5,000-1 odds , but braintree town are one step closer to securing a great sporting story of their own as they reach the national league play-offs .
all that stands in their way to a final at wembley is a two legged semi-final against grimbsy on thursday and sunday .

documents.title: once upon a time : braintree town has football fairytale in the making
text: chances are by now you 've heard that leicester city won the premier league last night in perhaps one of the greatest sporting stories of all time .
but essex has its own football fairytale in the making .
part-time braintree town secured a national league play-off place by beating altrincham 3-0 over the weekend .
if the iron can beat grimbsy in the coming week , they will head to wembley to fight for a place in league two - something that can only be described as an incredible achievement .
the # braintree players thanking their fans
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: did you take on the 250m water slide in colchester yesterday ?
text: were you one of the brave souls who took a ride down the 250m ( 820ft ) water slide in colchester yesterday ?
the two lane sliderider was set up in north hill to raise cash for cancer research uk on bank holiday monday .
shelley moules tweeted this from the scene adding the attraction was `` very popular '' .
if you filmed a ride down the slide , let us know .
# sliderider very popular today # colchester
@ twitterid hi shelley - could we use these on the bbc website ?
we 'll credit you of course .
@ twitterid yes of course : )
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your nice start across essex
text: it looks as if everybody in essex is waking up to sunshine this morning .
thanks to bbc weather watcher `` mickmoo '' for sending this to us from brightlingsea where it was sunny at 8c ( 46f ) .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: man bailed after five hurt in a12 crash
text: a man arrested after a crash on the a12 which injured five people has been released on bail .
a 15-year-old girl was among those hurt on the southbound carriageway near witham early yesterday morning .
a 40-year-old man , from west london , arrested on sus of driving while under the influence of drink or drugs was bailed until july .

documents.title: essex victim named in north yorkshire light aircraft crash
text: it has emerged one of the pilots killed in a plane crash in north yorkshire at the weekend was from essex .
ajvir singh sandhu , 25 , from essex , was one of two men who died when their aircraft came down in ryedale on saturday morning .
the air accidents investigation branch has launched an inquiry .

documents.title: weather : a bright and sunny start
text: although there will be clear blue skies to begin with , there will be some patchy cloud starting to bubble up as the day goes on , with the chance of the odd spot of light rain .
maximum temperature : 15c ( 59f ) .
you can get the latest forecast throughout the day at bbc weather .
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: welcome to essex live
text: good morning and welcome to essex live - hope you had a great bank holiday weekend .
join us until 18:00 for the latest news , sport , weather and travel updates across the county .
if you 'd like to get in touch you can email us , tweet us , or visit our facebook page .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live
